response.original_title: Marillion - Sounds That Can't Be Made (High-Resolution)
response.overview: “Sounds That Can't Be Made – High-Resolution Edition” presents Marillion’s critically acclaimed 2012 studio album in stunning 24-bit/96kHz high-fidelity audio. This special release includes both stereo and 5.1 surround mixes, offering a deeply immersive listening experience. Featuring powerful tracks like "Gaza", "Power", and "Montreal", the album showcases the band's progressive soundscapes and emotional depth. Ideal for audiophiles and fans alike, this edition captures the full dynamic range and nuance intended by the band, delivered in studio-quality resolution.
response.title: Marillion - Sounds That Can't Be Made (High-Resolution)
